message: Any good bands you guys know? :D

well I looked up metalcore on wikipedia. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Metalcore#Metallic_hardcore_.281989.E2.80.932000.29 out of the bands mentioned, I would suggest In Flames, All that Remains, and At The Gates,  and I guess if At the Gates has to be mentioned, then why not The Haunted?
